message: So I just recently started working with Jenkins CI to do builds on some web projects, but I was curious: what do you all use for your "build" steps in a project usually?
Currently, I've been using some Ruby/Shell scripts, but was curious what others liked to use
basically that. Its generally a good idea to have a one-step build process (especially for brining on new folks to your project). I tend to just hook up CI through that.
